context_bundle.summary: Memory systems: Sensory (iconic/echoic), short-term/working memory, long-term (declarative: episodic/semantic, procedural). Encoding, consolidation, retrieval. Forgetting curves, spacing effect, testing effect.

onboarding.quick_start: Encoding specificity: Context matters. Spacing > massing. Testing > re-reading. Sleep consolidates. Retrieval practice strengthens traces.
common_patterns: Encoding: Depth of processing (shallow phonemic < deep semantic), elaboration, distinctiveness
Consolidation: Sleep-dependent, hippocampal replay, synaptic consolidation (hours) vs systems (weeks)
Retrieval: Cue-dependent, encoding specificity, transfer-appropriate processing
known_errors: Re-reading for learning - illusion of competence, testing is better
Massed practice - feels effective but spacing wins long-term
Context-independent study - hurts transfer to new contexts
